markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[The Warmaster Council](/Articles.aspx?ID=71)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes](/Sources.aspx?ID=188) pg. 70</row>

Geb's elite assembly of [graveknight](/Monsters.aspx?ID=244) generals, his Warmaster Council, prepares for inevitable war. Meet the leaders of this grim council and learn their plans!
name: The Warmaster Council
